results.title: My Little Pony: The Movie
results.creator_credit: Lionsgate, DHX Media, Hasbro Studios, Allspark Pictures, Marcia Gwendolyn Jones, Rita Hsiao, Brian Goldner, Joe Ballarini, Stephen Davis, Meghan McCarthy, Jayson Thiessen, Michael Vogel and Haven Alexander
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: A new dark force threatens Ponyville, and the Mane 6 – Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy and Rarity – embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship and save their home.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lionsgate, DHX Media, Hasbro Studios, Allspark Pictures, Marcia Gwendolyn Jones, Rita Hsiao, Brian Goldner, Joe Ballarini, Stephen Davis, Meghan McCarthy, Jayson Thiessen, Michael Vogel and Haven Alexander

results.title: My Country, My Country
results.brief_description: The director follows a Sunni Arab doctor as he prepares to run for the early 2005 elections in Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

results.description: The director follows a Sunni Arab doctor as he prepares to run for the early 2005 elections in Iraq.
description_for_label: The director follows a Sunni Arab doctor as he prepares to run for the early 2005 elections in Iraq.

results.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
results.brief_description: When she receives word that her longtime platonic pal Michael O’Neal is getting married to debutante Kimberly Wallace, food critic Julianne Potter realizes her true feelings for Michael — and sets out to sabotage the wedding.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.description: When she receives word that her longtime platonic pal Michael O’Neal is getting married to debutante Kimberly Wallace, food critic Julianne Potter realizes her true feelings for Michael — and sets out to sabotage the wedding.
description_for_label: When she receives word that her longtime platonic pal Michael O’Neal is getting married to debutante Kimberly Wallace, food critic Julianne Potter realizes her true feelings for Michael — and sets out to sabotage the wedding.

results.title: Mrs. Soffel
results.brief_description: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.
results.description: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.
description_for_label: A prison warden’s wife is seduced into helping a notorious killer escape.

results.title: Mr. Squiggle
results.brief_description: Mr. Squiggle was Australia’s longest-running children’s television series, and the name of the title character from that ABC show. The show has been presented in many formats, from five minute slots to a one-and-a-half hour variety show featuring other performers, and has had several name changes, originally airing as Mr. Squiggle and Friends.
results.description: Mr. Squiggle was Australia’s longest-running children’s television series, and the name of the title character from that ABC show. The show has been presented in many formats, from five minute slots to a one-and-a-half hour variety show featuring other performers, and has had several name changes, originally airing as Mr. Squiggle and Friends.

results.title: Morocco
results.creator_credit: Hector Turnbull, Jules Furthman, Josef von Sternberg, Benno Vigny and Paramount
results.brief_description: The Foreign Legion marches into Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act.

constellations_other.name: Wearing the pants, ladies who lead
constellations_other.description: The pre-code 1932 feature, A Bill of Divorcement, a glass cinema slide of which features in the glass cinema slide display, stars John Barrymore and Katharine Hepburn in her screen debut.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Hector Turnbull, Jules Furthman, Josef von Sternberg, Benno Vigny and Paramount
results.description: The Foreign Legion marches in to Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act. Both bruised by their past lives, the two edge cautiously into a no-strings relationship while being pursued by others. But Tom must leave on a perilous mission: is it too late for them?
description_for_label: The Foreign Legion marches in to Mogador with booze and women in mind just as singer Amy Jolly arrives from Paris to work at Lo Tinto’s cabaret. That night, insouciant legionnaire Tom Brown catches her inimitably seductive, tuxedo-clad act. Both bruised by their past lives, the two edge cautiously into a no-strings relationship while being pursued by others. But Tom must leave on a perilous mission: is it too late for them?

results.title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
results.creator_credit: Roger Briaucourt, Henri Schmitt, Fred Orain, Jacques Tati and Cady
results.brief_description: Monsieur Hulot, Jacques Tati’s endearing clown, takes a holiday at a seaside resort, where his presence provokes one catastrophe after another. Tati’s masterpiece of gentle slapstick is a series of effortlessly well-choreographed sight gags involving dogs, boats, and firecrackers; it was the first entry in the Hulot series and the film that launched its maker to international stardom.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Roger Briaucourt, Henri Schmitt, Fred Orain, Jacques Tati and Cady

results.title: Mommy Dead and Dearest
results.brief_description: Child abuse, mental illness, and forbidden love converge in this mystery involving a mother and daughter who were thought to be living a fairy tale life that turned out to be a living nightmare.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.description: Child abuse, mental illness, and forbidden love converge in this mystery involving a mother and daughter who were thought to be living a fairy tale life that turned out to be a living nightmare.

results.title: Molly
results.creator_credit: John Molloy, Liz Doran, M4 Entertainment Production and Mushroom Pictures
results.brief_description: From humble beginnings in Quambatook, Ian Meldrum rose to become the most influential and well known name in Australian music.

constellations_other.name: The secret life of suburbia and music videos
constellations_other.description: Australia's famous streets and suburbs have defined music videos, TV shows and miniseries, providing a unique backdrop to Australian stories and music.

results.creator_credit_for_label: John Molloy, Liz Doran, M4 Entertainment Production and Mushroom Pictures
results.description: From humble beginnings in Quambatook, Ian Meldrum rose to become the most influential and well known name in Australian music.

results.title: Modern Times
results.brief_description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

constellations_other.name: Cinema to superheroes
constellations_other.description: This Magnaphonic Projector and its double were originally used in the Tallangatta cinema in the 1930s.

results.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.
